manual.title: User Manual
manual.description: A guide to the main features and how to use this site.

basics.title: Basic Concepts
basics.threadDescription: A thread is a conversation space for a topic. You can create a new thread by entering a title, content, and username.
basics.responseDescription: Responses are replies to a thread. The thread body is #0, and subsequent replies are numbered from 1.
basics.authorIdDescription: An identifier generated based on IP and date to distinguish users on anonymous boards. The ID changes when the date changes.

responseInteraction.title: Response Interaction
responseInteraction.description: Interactive features available on response cards.
responseInteraction.seqCopyDescription: Click a response number (#1, #2, etc.) to copy the anchor text (e.g., board>123>5) to clipboard. Use this to reference the response elsewhere.
responseInteraction.filterDescription: Click a username or author ID to filter responses by that author. Selecting multiple authors filters with OR condition.
responseInteraction.filterToggleDescription: Click the eye icon in the filter section of the sidebar to temporarily disable the filter. Filter selections are preserved, and clicking again reactivates the filter.
responseInteraction.filterRemoveDescription: Click the X button on each filter chip to remove that specific filter.

threadSettings.title: Thread Settings
threadSettings.description: Settings and status related to threads.
threadSettings.endedDescription: When a thread is ended, no new responses can be written. Depending on board settings, threads may automatically end after reaching a certain number of responses.
threadSettings.passwordDescription: The password set when creating the thread can be used to delete responses.

settings.title: Writing Settings
settings.description: Settings related to writing responses. Global settings can be changed on the Settings page, and per-thread settings can be changed in the mode bar above the input form on thread pages. These settings are stored in your browser.
settings.quickSubmitDescription: Quickly submit responses using Ctrl+Enter or Shift+Enter. (Global setting)
settings.chatModeDescription: When enabled, new responses are automatically received in real-time. (Per-thread setting)
settings.aaModeDescription: Automatically wraps your content with AA (ASCII Art) tags. Useful when writing ASCII art. (Global/Per-thread setting)
settings.previewModeDescription: Preview how your content will be displayed in real-time while typing. (Global/Per-thread setting)
settings.noupModeDescription: The thread won't be bumped to the top when you write a response. (Global/Per-thread setting)
settings.alwaysBottomDescription: Always scroll to the bottom of the page. Useful for real-time chat. (Global/Per-thread setting)

tom.title: TOM Markup
tom.description: TOM (Tunaground Object Markup) is a markup language for text formatting. Use brackets to apply various effects.
tom.subTitle: Subscript

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: You can change the screen theme. Click the theme button in the top bar to cycle through themes.
theme.lightDescription: The default bright theme. Uses a white background with dark text.
theme.greyDescription: A grey-toned theme that reduces eye strain. Uses soft grey tones without any white.
theme.darkDescription: A dark theme suitable for low-light environments. Uses a dark background with light text.

userCounter.title: User Counter
userCounter.description: The top bar displays the number of users currently viewing the page.
userCounter.indexDescription: Shows the number of users viewing that board. Always displayed.
userCounter.traceDescription: Shows the number of users viewing that thread. Only displayed when 'Show user count' is enabled in board settings.
userCounter.deduplicationDescription: Even if the same user opens multiple tabs, they are counted as 1 person.

sidebar.title: Thread Page Menu
sidebar.description: Menu available in the sidebar on the thread detail page.
sidebar.manageDescription: Open the thread management modal to hide/restore responses.
sidebar.viewAllDescription: Display all responses in the thread on one page.
sidebar.viewRecentDescription: Display only the most recent responses.
sidebar.prevDescription: Display responses from the previous page.
sidebar.nextDescription: Display responses from the next page.
sidebar.scrollUpDescription: Scroll to the top of the page.
sidebar.scrollDownDescription: Scroll to the bottom of the page.
